Professor Datuk Ts. Dr. Shahrin bin Sahib @ Sahibuddin, FASc, PTech., Hon. MIIEM<\/strong>
Professor of Information and Communication Technology
<\/p>

Qualification and Recognition<\/strong><\/p>

  • Fellow of Academy of Sciences Malaysia, 2018<\/li>
  • Honorary Doctorate, Tokushima University, Japan, 2018<\/li>
  • PhD. Computer Science in Parallel Processing, Sheffield University, UK, 1995<\/li>
  • MSc. Engineering Electrical Engineering, Purdue University, USA, 1991<\/li>
  • BSc. Engineering Computer Systems Purdue University, USA, 1989<\/li>
  • Associate of General Studies with Distinction ITM\/MUCIA Programme, IUPUI, 1987
    <\/li><\/ul>

    Field of Specialization<\/strong>
    Cyber Security, Networking, Computer Systems, Parallel Processing
    <\/p>

    Research Group<\/strong>
    Information Security Forensics and Computer Networking (INSFORNET), UTeM<\/p>","alignment":""}},{"id":"acd5ea21-bdf0-41b4-941b-d60abe933a0a","type":"general","name":"button","visibility":true,"title":"Button","icon":"
